original_title: អំណោយស្នេហ៍ ថ្ងៃណាត់ជួប
overview: Nora has arranged for Khay to negotiate the sale of the condo back to the company Khay is working for. Nora gave a gift of candy to Khay as a gift for the first time. The next day, the news of Nora's suicide after selling a condo made the news almost unbelievable. Khay came to see Nora at the hospital and took the candy that Nora had given her to pray for Nora to wake up. A miracle happened: Khay's spirit entered Nora's body at that time.
title: Wishing Lollipop
